content.html: Write a blog post about B*tCo*n and you'll get ALL the pingback spam from the dodgiest sites. This is such a scammy "industry". On the pus side, I now now my full name in German is "Terence Eden, ein britischer Nerd und Blogger,"
content.value:
Write a blog post about B*tCo*n and you'll get ALL the pingback spam from the dodgiest sites.

This is such a scammy "industry". 

On the pus side, I now now my full name in German is "Terence Eden, ein britischer Nerd und Blogger,"
